AUTHOR: MarioTheGamer30
DESCRIPTION: A cog using the 'wikia' library to easily read Wikia's. It gives you a basic description, and it doesn't give you a full description like other wikia readers as this one is very simple.
INSTALL_MSG: Congratulations on installing Wikia Reader. A full list of commands can appear if you say [p]WikiaHelp
NAME: WikiaReaer
SHORT: A Cog for reading other Wikia's.
